attributes.action: to sack all labour mps who stole from taxpayers and prosecute them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: mps scandal has proven things are not right in parliment and to start to sort this we need to replace all mps who made unright, unjustified claims for taxpayers cash. if i did what mps did in my job i would be jailed for it why should mps get treated any different.

rejection.details:
As a Government website, we cannot host party political material eg references to political parties. We suggest you contact the relevant party with your concerns.
Prosecuting people is outside the remit of Government. It is the role of the Crown Prosecution Service.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
